ygData.subject: Re: Guardians Rythmns and Magic Resistance
ygData.msgSnippet: guardian rhythms also stacks with level 41 psalm of mystic shielding, which in itself boosts MR 50+.  with guardian rhythms and a drum and endure magic spell,
ygData.messageBody:
guardian rhythms also stacks with level 41 psalm of mystic shielding, which
in itself boosts MR 50+. with guardian rhythms and a drum and endure magic
spell, WOW hehe, i can see 150 MR easily achieved.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 8:47 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Guardians Rythmns and Magic Resistance
>
>
> From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
>
> I posted this to another bard list:
> Yes casters are a pain. I found that the best way to weather
> the intial
> onslaught is to twist Guardian and Elemental Rythmns with a
> drum plus have
> the Cleric/Shaman in the party cast Endure Magic on you. With
> this combo I
> can boast my MR to 122 (I have lots of MR boasting items too). I have
> weathered multiable force shocks/lightening blasts/etc.. with
> this combo.
> Plus the rest of the party does better too . I love seeing
> the 'You have
> resisted Force Shock' message, esp when is was casted by a red mob.
>
> >From: CMai <CMai@...>
> >Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
> >Subject: Re: [eqbards] Quick question re: choices of primary
> & secondary w
> >eapons
> >Date: Mon, 14 Jun 1999 11:04:53 -0400
> >
> >From: CMai <CMai@...>
> >
> >question about guardian song. Does it really work? I mean
> I saw the
> >resist
> >increase but I still get dmg by spell users npc just the
> same. I do not
> >see
> >it getting any better.
> >
> >Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
> >Hammerpaw and Samiam
> >Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
>
> All the increased resistance means is that you have a better
> chance or
> reducing the amount of damage from the caster, it is not
> immunity to magic.
> Also all the Rythmn songs work much better with a drum.
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong
> Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
> Karana Server
>
>
